qas.question: The picnic was canceled because it rained. If it had not rained, what could have happened instead?
choices: the picnic went ahead as planned

qas.question: The parade stopped because it started to snow. If it had not snowed, what could have happened?
The game was canceled because the coach was sick. If the coach had not been sick, what could have happened?
The picnic ended early because it got dark. If it had stayed light, what could have happened?
choices: the picnic could have gone longer

qas.question: The story time was quiet because the kids were sleepy. If they had not been sleepy, what could have happened?
The sandcastle fell because a big wave hit it. If the wave had not come, what could have happened?
choices: the sandcastle could have stayed up

qas.question: The kite would not fly because there was no wind. If there had been wind, what could have happened?
choices: the kite still would not fly

qas.question: The puddle formed because it rained hard. If it had not rained, what could have happened?
choices: the ground could have stayed dry

qas.question: The cake burned because it was left in too long. If it had not been left in too long, what could have happened?
choices: the cake could have baked okay

qas.question: The toy boat sank because it had a hole. If it did not have a hole, what could have happened?
The flower wilted because no one watered it. If it had been watered, what could have happened?
choices: the flower could have stayed fresh
